update 6c_defect_repeat_count
count = #{count},
countb = #{countb},
countc = #{countc},
countd = #{countd},
counte = #{counte},
countf = #{countf},
countg = #{countg},
count1 = #{count1},
count2 = #{count2},
count3 = #{count3},
count4 = #{count4},
count5 = #{count5},
count6 = #{count6},
count7 = #{count7},
defect_id1 = #{defectId1},
defect_id2 = #{defectId2},
defect_id3 = #{defectId3},
defect_id4 = #{defectId4},
defect_id5 = #{defectId5},
defect_id6 = #{defectId6},
defect_id7 = #{defectId7},

defect_repeat_idsb = #{defectRepeatIdsb},

defect_repeat_idsd = #{defectRepeatIdsd},

defect_repeat_idsg = #{defectRepeatIdsg},
where id = #{id}
